channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Researchers track plasma creation using novel ultra-fast laser method
item.description: A team of researchers supported by the U.S. National Science Foundation has developed a new method of tracking the ultra-fast heat progression in warm...

item.title: Some diabetes drugs tied to lower risk of dementia, Parkinson's disease
item.description: A class of drugs for diabetes may be associated with a lower risk of dementia and Parkinson's disease, according to a new study.

item.title: NSF investing $48M to broaden participation in computing

item.title: Explaining dramatic planet-wide changes after world's last 'Snowball Earth' event

item.title: Homemade 'play-putty' can read the body's electric signals
